statements: SELECT * FROM product_performance
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance ORDER BY sales_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE market_trend = 'Stable'
SELECT product_name, market_trend FROM product_performance ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM product_performance ORDER BY sales_amount DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 10000 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, market_trend FROM product_performance WHERE market_trend = 'Stable' LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, market_trend FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE market_trend LIKE '%up%'
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_value > 100;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price, inventory_count FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND inventory_count > 0
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Clothing' OR category = 'Shoes'
SELECT product_name, category, price, inventory_count FROM Products WHERE inventory_count BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY inventory_count ASC
SELECT product_name, category, price, date_added FROM Products WHERE date_added > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM product_performance ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM dashboard_data WHERE dashboard_type = 'Financial';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT dashboard_name, last_updated FROM dashboard_data WHERE dashboard_type = 'Sales' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_type, last_updated FROM dashboard_data WHERE last_updated >= '2023-01-01' AND dashboard_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT trend_name, description, start_date, end_date FROM Trends ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Products GROUP BY category;
SELECT Customers.customer_name, Sales.sale_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers JOIN Sales ON Customers.customer_id = Sales.sale_id JOIN Products ON Sales.product_id = Products.id;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM Trends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM product_performance;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT trend_name FROM market_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT review_id, review_rating, review_comment FROM product_reviews WHERE review_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM product_performance ORDER BY product_name DESC, sales_amount ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM product_performance JOIN sales_data ON product_performance.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE sale_amount >= 1000
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM product_performance GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT trend_name, AVG(trend_value) AS average_value FROM market_trends WHERE trend_value > 0 GROUP BY trend_name ORDER BY average_value DESC
SELECT * FROM product_reviews JOIN sales_data ON product_reviews.product_id = sales_data.product_id WHERE review_rating >= 4 AND sale_amount > 500
